/// \file  enumtables.c
/// \brief Enumeration string tables for dehacked.

//
// Do not edit! This file is generated by the
// enumtables pre-build script.
// See ../enumtables.txt for the template.
//

#include "doomtype.h"
#include "doomdef.h"
#include "enumtables.h"
#include "info.h"

////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// CRAZY LIST OF STATE NAMES AND ALL FROM HERE DOWN

// RegEx to generate this from info.h: ^\tS_([^,]+), --> \t"S_\1",
// I am leaving the prefixes solely for clarity to programmers,
// because sadly no one remembers this place while searching for full state names.
const char *const STATE_LIST[] = {
// ENUMTABLES STATE_LIST
#ifdef SEENAMES
    "S_NAMECHECK",
#endif
};

// RegEx to generate this from info.h: ^\tMT_([^,]+), --> \t"MT_\1",
// I am leaving the prefixes solely for clarity to programmers,
// because sadly no one remembers this place while searching for full state names.
const char *const MOBJTYPE_LIST[] = {
// ENUMTABLES MOBJTYPE_LIST
#ifdef SEENAMES
    "MT_NAMECHECK",
#endif
};

/** Array mapping action names to action functions.
  * Names must be in ALL CAPS for case insensitive comparisons.
  */
actionpointer_t actionpointers[] =
{
// ENUMTABLES actionpointers
    {{NULL}, "NONE"},

	// This NULL entry must be the last in the list
	{{NULL}, NULL},
};
